events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly to determine your fit for the role.
Your application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills in software development and related experience.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out to you with next steps soon.
The initial screening call went well. You demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
You responded positively to our invitation for a technical interview, confirming your availability next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and let us know if you have questions.
You completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency expected for the engineering role.
We have scheduled an HR interview for you on May 25th at 2 PM UTC to discuss cultural fit and company values.
The HR interview went well with positive feedback regarding your alignment with team culture and communication skills.
We have extended a formal offer for the software engineering position, including details about compensation and benefits.
You provided favorable feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
You formally accepted the job offer, and we are excited to move forward with your onboarding process.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation sessions, system access setup, and introductions to the engineering team.
The hiring process is now complete with your successful integration into the engineering team as a full-time software engineer.
